body_html: @apaszke it is built inside a docker image, that is later run with --runtime=nvidia nvidia-docker. In that module I did not see warnings module being used, but rather print statements and wanted to be consistent, should I change to use warnings?
body_text: @apaszke it is built inside a docker image, that is later run with --runtime=nvidia nvidia-docker. In that module I did not see warnings module being used, but rather print statements and wanted to be consistent, should I change to use warnings?
body: @apaszke it is built inside a docker image, that is later run with `--runtime=nvidia` nvidia-docker. In that module I did not see warnings module being used, but rather `print` statements and wanted to be consistent, should I change to use warnings?
